      Resets selection parameters.
      private void doNavigation()
      Instantiates a new MapActivity.NavigateTask, which… Uses the Navigator to compute the path between all pairs of nodes x,y, where the codes of x and y match those of navigationSrc and navigationDst respectively, then selects the path with the lowest total weight using weight(List).

      The navigation-specific counterpart to deselect().

      • startNavSelect

        private void startNavSelect(android.widget.Button btn)
        Launches search, and changes the app state st when you select a location, it is used for navigation. Sets the text, icon and listener of the button it came from
        Parameters:
        btn - The Button object that this came from, one of navigation_src_btn or navigation_dst_btn

      • exitNavigation

        private void exitNavigation()
        The navigation-specific counterpart to deselect(). If a location was selected before we started navigation, go back to showing it. Otherwise just hides the nav UI

      • cancelNavSelect

        private void cancelNavSelect(android.widget.Button btn)
        Reverses the effects of startNavSelect(android.widget.Button)
        Parameters:
        btn - The Button object that this came from, one of navigation_src_btn or navigation_dst_btn

      • startNavigationTo

        private void startNavigationTo(Location l)
        Brings up the navigation interface with the given location as the destination
        Parameters:
        l - The location to nav to. Currently this is always == selectedLocation

      • setNavigationSrc

        private void setNavigationSrc(Location l)
        Sets the source of the current navigation route to the given Location, including setting button text and performing the navigation if appropriate
        Parameters:
        l - The Location to be the new source

      • setNavigationDst

        private void setNavigationDst(Location l)
        Basically identical to setNavigationSrc(Location). The two could be combined but that would require more parameters
        Parameters:
        l - The Location to be the new destination
        See Also:
        setNavigationSrc(Location)

      • resetNavButtons

        private void resetNavButtons()
        Sets the navigation buttons back to their original state.

      • doNavigation

        private void doNavigation()
        Instantiates a new MapActivity.NavigateTask, which… Uses the Navigator to compute the path between all pairs of nodes x,y, where the codes of x and y match those of navigationSrc and navigationDst respectively, then selects the path with the lowest total weight using weight(List). It draws this route to the buffer using MapView.drawRoute(Route).

      • onPhotoTap

        public void onPhotoTap(android.widget.ImageView view,
                       float x,
                       float y)
        Selection by search. Note that it calls select(Location) not showLocation(Location) as selection may be used for navigation not just display If the floor selector is shown, it hides it instead of search.
        Specified by:
        onPhotoTap in interface com.github.chrisbanes.photoview.OnPhotoTapListener
        Parameters:
        view - The origin of the event. In our case always == mapView
        x - The 0-1 value denoting the x on the image of the tap
        y - The 0-1 value denoting the y on the image of the tap

      • select

        private void select(Location l)
        Shows or sets navigation parameters based on the current state
        Parameters:
        l - The selected Location

      • deselect

        private void deselect()
        Resets selection parameters. The check is used to avoid unnecessary graphics operations

      • showLocation

        private void showLocation(Location l)
        Marks and zooms in on a location on the map, and sets it to be the selected location
        Parameters:
        l - The location to be shown

      • bottomBarShowSelection

        private void bottomBarShowSelection()
        Hides the navigation element of the layout and shows the one for selection

      • bottomBarShowNavigation

        private void bottomBarShowNavigation()
        Inverse of bottomBarShowSelection()

      • bottomBarHide

        private void bottomBarHide()
        Hides the box that shows selection or nav info

      • weight

        private int weight(java.util.List<Path> p)
        Used by doNavigation() to find the best route
        Parameters:
        p - A list of paths
        Returns:
        The sum of the weights of all paths in p

      • getUserFromParams

        private User getUserFromParams(boolean staff,
                               boolean disabled)

      • absDist

        private double absDist(Location l,
                       float x,
                       float y)
        Parameters:
        l - A location
        x - X-value of a point
        y - Y-value of a point
        Returns:
        the Euclidean distance (in px) of a Location l from the point x,y
